revised_title: Ancient Arabian Date on the Parish Church of Rumsey
tldr: The author discusses an ancient Arabian date found on the North Front of the Parish Church of Rumsey in Hampshire. The date, 1011, is the oldest known date in Arabian figures in England and challenges the opinions of learned men like Scaliger, Vossius, and Dr. Wallis. The author also corrects a mistake in Sir H. Savil's edition of Roger Howeden, distinguishing between Rumsey and Ramsey.
